set_holiday_schedule.name: Set holiday schedule
set_holiday_schedule.description: Set a holiday schedule for all thermostats in the installation. This overrides the normal weekly program for the specified period.

entity_id.name: Thermostat
entity_id.description: Any thermostat entity from the installation (holiday applies installation-wide).

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: The date and time when the holiday schedule should start.

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: The date and time when the holiday schedule should end and normal programming should resume.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: The heating mode to use during the holiday period.

cancel_holiday_schedule.name: Cancel holiday schedule
cancel_holiday_schedule.description: Cancel the active or scheduled holiday for all thermostats in the installation, returning them to their normal weekly program.

entity_id.name: Thermostat
entity_id.description: Any thermostat entity from the installation (cancellation applies installation-wide).

import_historical_statistics.name: Import historical statistics
import_historical_statistics.description: Import historical energy consumption data into Home Assistant's long-term statistics. Uses intelligent dynamic aggregation: hourly for last 7 days, daily for 8-90 days ago, monthly for older data.

energy_entity.name: Energy entity
energy_entity.description: Select the energy consumption sensor to import historical data for.

days_back.name: Days to import
days_back.description: Number of days of historical data to import (1-365). Recent data gets hourly detail, older data uses coarser aggregation.

end_date_before_start.message: The end date must be after the start date.
